title: Tier 2 on Worlds 2016 Summoner Icon is the max?
body:
Dear Riot,

My favourite team are not at Worlds this year and I still really want to have this cool recall animation. Does the World 2016 Summoner Icon contain an option for a Tier 3 upgrade? 

If not, you may tell people that Tier 2 is the max, because they may waste their IP for those Jewels token and wait for getting to Tier 3, then realize Tier 2 is the max.

Best,
LCS Slash

replies.body: The general Worlds Championship icon doesn't have an additional tier.  There is no additional emotes or animations like team icons, so there's no reason to upgrade it.  Hopefully that helps clear things up!
Is there a way to get a team one?
You bet!  They are available for RP in the store!  When you open the store, select Accessories, then select Summoner Icons on the left side!  Have fun!
i think he meant if there exists a way to obtain a team icon for IP or for free.

Hi, I just bought one more team icon. But I can't see the tier 2 and tier 3 for that icon in the inventory. So it means I just can use the championship jewels for only one team icon?? Or there are something wrong in my account????
